cristal-den/potioks-spy.title: Disappeared Potiok spy
cristal-den/potioks-spy.description: The Matriarch, leader of the Potiok family, asked you to find out what happened to the spy she sent to keep an eye on Bibin, in the slums.
cristal-den/potioks-spy.learnAboutSavageConnection: Get an important information out of the spy
